EmployeeTask.Name: Increase average subscription size to at least $295 per month.
Update Employee Files with New NDA
Sign Updated NDA
EmployeeTask.Description: You must sign updated NDA. Documents have been emailed to you. Once documents have been signed, please retain one copy for your records and return one to HR for filing.

EmployeeTask.Name: Submit Questions Regarding New NDA
EmployeeTask.Description: The new NDA is now required for employment. I need a list of questions or issues so we can submit all paperwork to HR.

EmployeeTask.Name: Provide New Health Insurance Docs
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to get employees to sign new health insurance documents. Need final paperwork from agents.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Changes to Health Insurance Coverage
EmployeeTask.Description: Shipping department must review new health insurance policy and submit paperwork by the end of the month. If not submitted, coverage will terminate.

EmployeeTask.Name: Reduce churn to less than 1% monthly.
Sign Health Insurance Forms
EmployeeTask.Description: Kevin asked me to collect all signed health insurance forms for him - he is too busy. Please get this done asap so I can get back to my regular job.

EmployeeTask.Name: Follow up with West Coast Stores
EmployeeTask.Description: The problem with the TVs has been confirmed with R&D. We need to immediately follow up with West Coast Retailers and let them know so we do not get any returns.

EmployeeTask.Name: Follow up with East Coast Stores
EmployeeTask.Description: The problem with the TVs has been confirmed with R&D. We need to immediately follow up with West Coast Retailers and let them know so we do not get any returns.

EmployeeTask.Name: Send Email to Customers about Recall
Give Final Approval for Refunds
EmployeeTask.Description: Refunds as a result of our TV recalls have been submitted. Need final approval to cut checks to customers.

EmployeeTask.Name: Prepare Product Recall Report
EmployeeTask.Description: Bart, this recall was an absolute disaster. Your report better be on my desk tomorrow. This is killing our bottom-line.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Product Recall Report by Engineering Team
EmployeeTask.Description: John, everyone in Engineering is working hard to avoid any future recalls. Can you please review this report and send me your thoughts.

EmployeeTask.Name: Create Training Course for New TVs
EmployeeTask.Description: After the recall, customers have option to purchase new version of TV. You need to prepare training course for our retail partners so they can better understand the design changes.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Training Course for any Ommissions
EmployeeTask.Description: Consider this most important item on your agenda. I need this new training material reviewed so it can be submitted to management.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Overtime Report
EmployeeTask.Description: Way too much overtime being submitted by the IT department please review numbers and get with management and tell me long term decision on this matter.

EmployeeTask.Name: Submit Overtime Request Forms
EmployeeTask.Description: You are working too many hours and management wants to stop it. You cannot work this much overtime. Send me the report so I can kick it up to HR. They need you to justify your hours.

EmployeeTask.Name: Overtime Approval Guidelines
EmployeeTask.Description: We cannot keep going like this. Everytime my people send overtime request, we get hassled. Can you please send me the definitive guide as to when people can submit overtime?

EmployeeTask.Name: Finalize the content strategy, key messages and topic structure for next 6 months
Create Report on Customer Feedback
EmployeeTask.Description: Ed asked me to get with you and prepare a full report of all questions being asked by customers about the recall and refund request forms. Legal does not want to take any action until we submit this.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Customer Feedback Report
EmployeeTask.Description: The problems with our recall and refund request forms are real. Sale staff are overwhelmed and are answering the same questions over and over again. Need a solution from legal.

EmployeeTask.Name: Prepare Shipping Cost Analysis Report
EmployeeTask.Description: Management needs to see which shipping company is giving us the best bang for our buck. Need the report asap as we have to commit to one shipper soon.

EmployeeTask.Name: Provide Feedback on Shippers
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to know which shipping companies you prefer to work. Looks like costs are all coming in the same so I think we just need to pick the one that offers the best services.

EmployeeTask.Name: Select Preferred Shipper
EmployeeTask.Description: All cost analysis reports have been prepared. I've also submitted personal opinions on all the shippers we've dealt with. We need a final decision so I can negotiate final contract.

EmployeeTask.Name: Grow subscriber base at least 5% per week.
Complete Shipper Selection Form
EmployeeTask.Description: The natives are getting restless. You need to make a final decision on the shipper we are going to go with. I don’t know why we can't choose a single shipper?

EmployeeTask.Name: Upgrade Server Hardware
EmployeeTask.Description: Website traffic has doubled. We must upgrade server hardware or customers will continue to experience difficulties ordering. We need a decision by end of month.

EmployeeTask.Name: Upgrade Personal Computers
EmployeeTask.Description: It's end-of-life for Windows XP. We either have to upgrade everyone's computers or upgrade the OS on existing customers. We need a final decision from management to proceed.

EmployeeTask.Name: Decide on Mobile Devices to Use in the Field
Upgrade Apps to Windows RT or stay with WinForms
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to decide if we are going to re-write apps as Metro apps or simply touch-enable our existing apps. Obviously the former is going to take a lot of time.

EmployeeTask.Name: Estimate Time Required to Touch-Enable Apps
Report on Tranistion to Touch-Based Apps
EmployeeTask.Description: I've given the approval to go with touch-based apps on WinForms vs complete re-write. I need your report as to when the apps are going to be ready to deploy to the field.

EmployeeTask.Name: Try New Touch-Enabled WinForms Apps
EmployeeTask.Description: The field will get this rolled out next week. You should try the apps on the new Surface tablets and give me your thoughts. We did not re-write anything - the app was already touch-enabled because we used DevExpress UI Controls.

EmployeeTask.Name: Rollout New Touch-Enabled WinForms Apps
EmployeeTask.Description: We are go to rollout the new WinForms apps to all Surface tablets used in the field.

EmployeeTask.Name: Determine New Online Marketing Strategy
EmployeeTask.Description: Online sales are a disaster. We need to rework our entire marketing message and spend a lot of money on ad-words to generate more traffic to our site. We have great products. I don’t understand the problem.

EmployeeTask.Name: New Online Marketing Strategy
EmployeeTask.Description: We need to do something to stop the fall in online sales right away. Management is putting a lot of pressure on me and I don’t know exactly what to do. Send me a report with your opinions.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve New Online Marketing Strategy
EmployeeTask.Description: We have prepared a detailed report of all options to improve online sales. We have 3 major recommendations and I need the ok to pursue this with the IT and design teams.

EmployeeTask.Name: Submit New Website Design
EmployeeTask.Description: New marketing strategy has been approved by management. I need a new website design.

EmployeeTask.Name: Increase the CTR% to above industry average 3.5%.
Create Icons for Website
EmployeeTask.Description: Im in a tough spot as management wants the new design right away. I need you to take the lead and create all the icons we are going to need for the new site. Send it to me asap.

EmployeeTask.Name: Create New Shopping Cart
EmployeeTask.Description: You have the PSDs from the design team. I need the cart updated. Management wants this done immediately.

EmployeeTask.Name: Create New Product Pages
EmployeeTask.Description: You have the PSDs from the design team. I need the product pages updated. Management wants this done immediately.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review New Product Pages
EmployeeTask.Description: Published the new product pages on our sandbox server. Can you take a look and give your thoughts. Is it what you wanted? I'm not sure that I like it that much.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Website Launch
EmployeeTask.Description: Everything is in place Robert. You are the final approval for us to launch the new website. Please give me the OK so I can get this done.

EmployeeTask.Name: Update Customer Shipping Profiles
EmployeeTask.Description: Problems with new website. We did not update shipping profiles and customers have no idea how to update personal information. Can you get on this asap?

EmployeeTask.Name: Create New Shipping Return Labels
EmployeeTask.Description: Need a new RMA label for the website. I've requested this a few times but it keeps getting put off. Can we get this completed by the end of the month Brett? It's really important.

EmployeeTask.Name: Get Design for Shipping Return Labels
EmployeeTask.Description: Wally, you are point to create the new RMA labels for the website. We are under pressure from the shipping department to get this done by month's end. Get with the design department and deploy it by the end of the month.

EmployeeTask.Name: PSD needed for Shipping Return Labels
Submit D&B Number to ISP for Credit Approval
EmployeeTask.Description: Our ISP is not willing to upgrade our access plan because they are concerned about our payment history. Sandra, please get them our D&B # so they can check our credit history.

EmployeeTask.Name: Contact ISP and Discuss Payment Options
EmployeeTask.Description: ISP is being difficult and refusing to increase our bandwidth because they say our credit is not good. Can you please get in touch with Herb Heart and resolve this. I don’t have much more information that I can provide them.

EmployeeTask.Name: Analyze Support Traffic
EmployeeTask.Description: We are being pushed to get the a support issues report delivered before year end. Can you aggragate all of our data so I can compile it and send it over to Barb?

EmployeeTask.Name: Review New Training Material
EmployeeTask.Description: Just getting ready to push out some new training material for our customers so they can better understand how our product line fits together. Can I get a review of the content so I can send it out to the printer?

EmployeeTask.Name: Distribute Training Material to Support Staff
EmployeeTask.Description: Please distribute new training material to all support staff. The information is very useful and I believe it will help us address issues in a more effective manner.

EmployeeTask.Name: Training Material Distribution Schedule
EmployeeTask.Description: I am in the process of publishing my new training material. It will be posted to the server. Please see that all support engineers have access to them.

EmployeeTask.Name: Provide New Artwork to Support Team
Publish New Art on the Server
EmployeeTask.Description: Violet, please get all our new art published so that other teams can use them as necessary. I asked you to do this a week ago.

EmployeeTask.Name: Replace Old Artwork with New Artwork
EmployeeTask.Description: Please replace all artwork / brochures / media being used for sales presentations with new materials produced by the graphic design team. If you have questions, ask me.

EmployeeTask.Name: Ship New Brochures to Field
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to receive 1000 new brochures so I can begin distributing it out to customer accounts that I manage. I've stopped using old brochures. Please forward new brochures to me asap.

EmployeeTask.Name: Ship Brochures to Todd Hoffman
EmployeeTask.Description: We need new brochures sent out to Todd Hoffman. It's urgent as we are no longer using older brochures and he has sales calls to make.

EmployeeTask.Name: Update Server with Service Packs
EmployeeTask.Description: Going directly to you Amelia as Brett is out of the office. We have to update the server with newest service pack. This is highest priority.

EmployeeTask.Name: Install New Database
EmployeeTask.Description: We are go on the new database. I need you to get it installed so we can begin company wide roll-out.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approval on Converting to New HDMI Specification
Create New Spike for Automation Server
EmployeeTask.Description: I need to see if this is a market we should enter and unless I get a spike, I wont know what to report to CEO.

EmployeeTask.Name: Report on Retail Sales Strategy
EmployeeTask.Description: Need a detailed report on retail sales strategy for 2014. Management wants to significantly increase revenues this year and retail is our primary focus.

EmployeeTask.Name: Code Review - New Automation Server
EmployeeTask.Description: Need your eyes on the new Automation Server product. I'm having performance issues and you have to figure out what is causing it.

EmployeeTask.Name: Achieve record metrics in all areas.
Feedback on New Training Course
EmployeeTask.Description: I have not received your feedback on my new training course. Can you please send me an email asap so I can consider your comments?

EmployeeTask.Name: Send Monthly Invoices from Shippers
EmployeeTask.Description: Im missing all invoices for this month and I cannot reconcile until I get them. Kevin, please remember to do this on a regular basis.

EmployeeTask.Name: Schedule Meeting with Sales Team
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to discuss new retail strategies with sales team. Please coordinate everything and make sure everyone is present.

EmployeeTask.Name: Confirm Availability for Sales Meeting
EmployeeTask.Description: I've called you a few times Hannah, but no response. Retail sales meeting is mandatory but I'm told you are going to be out of town. Please advise.

EmployeeTask.Name: Send 2 Remotes for Giveaways
EmployeeTask.Description: Running a contest in my region and will be giving away 2 remote controls. Can you send them to me asap.

EmployeeTask.Name: Ship 2 Remotes Priority to Clark Morgan
EmployeeTask.Description: Please refer to my Email. We are doing a giveaway in Clark's region and we need to send 2 remotes.

EmployeeTask.Name: Follow Up Email with Recent Online Purchasers
EmployeeTask.Description: Need you to send Emails to everyone who purchased a product online in the last week. We want to test whether this yields a sales improvement.

EmployeeTask.Name: Replace Desktops on the 3rd Floor
EmployeeTask.Description: Been told that all desktops on the third floor have to be replaced. We are being asked to do it because of workload in IT dept.

EmployeeTask.Name: Mail New Leads for Follow Up
Send Territory Sales Breakdown
EmployeeTask.Description: Need you to create a spreadsheet with sales by territory and forward it to CEO. He is on vacation and does not have access to VPN.

EmployeeTask.Name: Organize an online survey with min 100 answers to rate our various content.
Report on the State of Engineering Dept
EmployeeTask.Description: Under a lot of pressure from CEO to figure out cause of refunds. Need you to send me a state of engineering dept report so we can get to the bottom of the problems.

EmployeeTask.Name: Staff Productivity Report
EmployeeTask.Description: We might need to cut back on your budget so can you send me staff productivity report so I can send it over to the CEO

EmployeeTask.Name: Review HR Budget Company Wide
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to do a top to bottom review on our payroll and figure out where we can cut costs.

EmployeeTask.Name: Sales Dept Budget Request Report
EmployeeTask.Description: I really need you to send me your budget report because CEO is looking to make changes and I'm stuck without your help.

EmployeeTask.Name: Improve our content and its distribution.
Approve Benefits Upgrade Package
EmployeeTask.Description: Negotiated a great new deal for health insurance. I need to get approval from you.

EmployeeTask.Name: Final Budget Review
EmployeeTask.Description: We need to get together and review the budget before kicking it up to John. I need you to take a look at what I sent and give me your thoughts.

EmployeeTask.Name: Implement 12 new channels/mediums where to post old or new content.
State of Operations Report
EmployeeTask.Description: I'm dissapointed you have not sent this report over to me. You know we are trying to manage a crisis and it does not help when you are not proactive.

EmployeeTask.Name: Specs for New Shipping Label
EmployeeTask.Description: We got your specs and we've started the redesign. We are confused by a few things and need you to reply to our Email with detailed information.

EmployeeTask.Name: Move Packaging Materials to New Warehouse
EmployeeTask.Description: You are going to have to coordinate the move. All packaging materials are your responsibility. You can hire temp workers if needed.

EmployeeTask.Name: Move Inventory to New Warehouse
EmployeeTask.Description: You are point person to get all inventory moved to the new warehouse location. You can hire temp workers if needed.

EmployeeTask.Name: Take Forklift to Service Center
EmployeeTask.Description: We cannot have the forklift continue to breakdown Victor. You know this is your responsibility and I want you to go out and get it fixed.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Rental of Forklift
EmployeeTask.Description: Do we have the ok to get a forklift rental. I still don’t know when our forklift is going to be fixed and I'm worried it might take a long time.

EmployeeTask.Name: Give Final Approval to Rent Forklift
EmployeeTask.Description: I cannot wait on your approval any longer. My staff is lifting boxes and everyone's back is starting to hurt. We need you to ok this.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Vacation Request
EmployeeTask.Description: Planning a trip with the family for 2 weeks. Can you give me the ok so I can submit this to HR?

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Salary Increase Request
EmployeeTask.Description: I am told by Bart that we have a salary freeze and that my request for an increase in salary is on hold. Please approve this request. I work very hard and deserve to be paid more.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Complaint Reports
EmployeeTask.Description: We are getting a lot of complaints sent to the Consumer Affairs dept. Can you please reivew the report I sent you and send me your thoughts as to how we can deal with all this.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Website Complaint Reports
EmployeeTask.Description: A lot of the reports about the website are related to uptime. You need to review this document and send and Email to me and Ken so we can deal with the Consumer Affairs Dept.

EmployeeTask.Description: We are creating a new section on our website for video interviews. Contact a few customers and see if they are willing to record a video review for us.

EmployeeTask.Description: I lost your expense reimbursement documents so I'm going to need you to send them to me by Email so this can get paid in this week's check run.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Vacation Request Form
EmployeeTask.Description: I need to take some time off. My back hurts from lifting all these boxes. Can you please approve my vacation.

EmployeeTask.Description: Need you to send Emails to everyone who purchased a product online in the last week. We want to test whether this yields a sales improvement.

EmployeeTask.Description: Need sign-off on the new NDA agreement. It's important that this is done quickly to prevent any unauthorized leaks.

EmployeeTask.Name: Support marketing and sales with design deliverables.
New Online Marketing Strategy
EmployeeTask.Description: We need to do something to stop the fall in online sales right away. Management is putting a lot of pressure on me and I don’t know exactly what to do. Send me a report with your opinions.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve New Online Marketing Strategy
EmployeeTask.Description: We have prepared a detailed report of all options to improve online sales. We have 3 major recommendations and I need the ok to pursue this with the IT and design teams.

EmployeeTask.Name: Submit New Website Design
EmployeeTask.Description: New marketing strategy has been approved by management. I need a new website design.

EmployeeTask.Name: Create Icons for Website
EmployeeTask.Description: Im in a tough spot as management wants the new design right away. I need you to take the lead and create all the icons we are going to need for the new site. Send it to me asap.

EmployeeTask.Name: Create New Shopping Cart
EmployeeTask.Description: You have the PSDs from the design team. I need the cart updated. Management wants this done immediately.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review New Product Pages
EmployeeTask.Description: Published the new product pages on our sandbox server. Can you take a look and give your thoughts. Is it what you wanted? I'm not sure that I like it that much.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Website Launch
EmployeeTask.Description: Everything is in place Robert. You are the final approval for us to launch the new website. Please give me the OK so I can get this done.

EmployeeTask.Name: Launch New Website
EmployeeTask.Description: You are good to go Brett. Launch the website and track first day activities. Send me a report once you have everything ready.

EmployeeTask.Name: Create New Shipping Return Labels
EmployeeTask.Description: Need a new RMA label for the website. I've requested this a few times but it keeps getting put off. Can we get this completed by the end of the month Brett? It's really important.

EmployeeTask.Name: Get Design for Shipping Return Labels
EmployeeTask.Description: Wally, you are point to create the new RMA labels for the website. We are under pressure from the shipping department to get this done by month's end. Get with the design department and deploy it by the end of the month.

EmployeeTask.Name: PSD needed for Shipping Return Labels
Request Bandwidth Increase from ISP
EmployeeTask.Description: Getting a lot of complaints from users about slow connection speeds. I've checked with our ISP and we can upgrade to a faster access plan.

EmployeeTask.Name: Submit D&B Number to ISP for Credit Approval
Contact ISP and Discuss Payment Options
EmployeeTask.Description: ISP is being difficult and refusing to increase our bandwidth because they say our credit is not good. Can you please get in touch with Herb Heart and resolve this. I don’t have much more information that I can provide them.

EmployeeTask.Name: Prepare Year-End Support Summary Report
EmployeeTask.Description: Need a summary of all major support issues we encountered this year. This report will be presented to management. You are the point person on this James.

EmployeeTask.Name: Promote our design team as the best place to work.
Analyze Support Traffic
EmployeeTask.Description: We are being pushed to get the a support issues report delivered before year end. Can you aggragate all of our data so I can compile it and send it over to Barb?

EmployeeTask.Name: Review New Training Material
EmployeeTask.Description: Just getting ready to push out some new training material for our customers so they can better understand how our product line fits together. Can I get a review of the content so I can send it out to the printer?

EmployeeTask.Name: Distribute Training Material to Support Staff
EmployeeTask.Description: Please distribute new training material to all support staff. The information is very useful and I believe it will help us address issues in a more effective manner.

EmployeeTask.Name: Provide New Artwork to Support Team
EmployeeTask.Description: We need to get new artwork and PDFs for the support team. We are currently using out-dated materials. Can you please publish them on our server…

EmployeeTask.Name: Publish New Art on the Server
Replace Old Artwork with New Artwork
EmployeeTask.Description: Please replace all artwork / brochures / media being used for sales presentations with new materials produced by the graphic design team. If you have questions, ask me.

EmployeeTask.Name: Ship New Brochures to Field
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to receive 1000 new brochures so I can begin distributing it out to customer accounts that I manage. I've stopped using old brochures. Please forward new brochures to me asap.

EmployeeTask.Name: Update Server with Service Packs
EmployeeTask.Description: Going directly to you Amelia as Brett is out of the office. We have to update the server with newest service pack. This is highest priority.

EmployeeTask.Name: Install New Database
EmployeeTask.Description: We are go on the new database. I need you to get it installed so we can begin company wide roll-out.

EmployeeTask.Name: Improve annual budgeting and business planning.
Approve Overtime for HR
EmployeeTask.Description: Submitted my overtime request to you for approval so I can walk it down to HR before the year end paycheck. I had no choice…I had to work overtime to get the database rolled out.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review New HDMI Specification
EmployeeTask.Description: This is already delayed too long. I need your report on the new HDMI specification and how we plan on getting to market.

EmployeeTask.Name: Approval on Converting to New HDMI Specification
Create New Spike for Automation Server
Report on Retail Sales Strategy
EmployeeTask.Description: Need a detailed report on retail sales strategy for 2014. Management wants to significantly increase revenues this year and retail is our primary focus.

EmployeeTask.Name: Receive business line budget proposals before.
Finish raising new capital for growth needs.
Send Monthly Invoices from Shippers
EmployeeTask.Description: Im missing all invoices for this month and I cannot reconcile until I get them. Kevin, please remember to do this on a regular basis.

EmployeeTask.Name: Schedule Meeting with Sales Team
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to discuss new retail strategies with sales team. Please coordinate everything and make sure everyone is present.

EmployeeTask.Name: Ship 2 Remotes Priority to Clark Morgan
Follow Up Email with Recent Online Purchasers
Update Database with New Leads
EmployeeTask.Description: I'm told you have all new leads from the tradeshow. Can you please update the database so I can begin my follow-ups.

EmployeeTask.Name: Mail New Leads for Follow Up
EmployeeTask.Description: I know you have no time to update the database yourself, but can you please forward the leads to me by mail so I an take care of my follow-ups?

EmployeeTask.Name: Territory Sales Breakdown Report
EmployeeTask.Description: Per discussion, I need territory sales report by EOD.

EmployeeTask.Name: Report on the State of Engineering Dept
EmployeeTask.Description: Under a lot of pressure from CEO to figure out cause of refunds. Need you to send me a state of engineering dept report so we can get to the bottom of the problems.

EmployeeTask.Name: Staff Productivity Report
EmployeeTask.Description: We might need to cut back on your budget so can you send me staff productivity report so I can send it over to the CEO

EmployeeTask.Name: Review HR Budget Company Wide
EmployeeTask.Description: Need to do a top to bottom review on our payroll and figure out where we can cut costs.

EmployeeTask.Name: Sales Dept Budget Request Report
EmployeeTask.Description: I really need you to send me your budget report because CEO is looking to make changes and I'm stuck without your help.

EmployeeTask.Name: IT Dept Budget Request Report
EmployeeTask.Description: You are usually really good at getting me this information but you have not done it this year. Being pressured by CEO to deliver final report. Please forward your budget report to me.

EmployeeTask.Name: Engineering Dept Budget Request Report
EmployeeTask.Description: Please see subject. You have to send me your budget report otherwise you may end up with cut-backs.

EmployeeTask.Name: 1Q Travel Spend Report
EmployeeTask.Description: Have complaints from management that travel costs are just too high. I need you to send me over your detailed report.

EmployeeTask.Name: Choose and launch new document sharing platform.
Final Budget Review
EmployeeTask.Description: We need to get together and review the budget before kicking it up to John. I need you to take a look at what I sent and give me your thoughts.

EmployeeTask.Name: State of Operations Report
EmployeeTask.Description: I'm dissapointed you have not sent this report over to me. You know we are trying to manage a crisis and it does not help when you are not proactive.

EmployeeTask.Name: Shipping Label Artwork
EmployeeTask.Description: Wants new shipping labels and I cannot print them without the artwork from your team. Can you please hurry and send it to me.

EmployeeTask.Name: Move Packaging Materials to New Warehouse
Approve Rental of Forklift
EmployeeTask.Description: Do we have the ok to get a forklift rental. I still don’t know when our forklift is going to be fixed and I'm worried it might take a long time.

EmployeeTask.Name: Give Final Approval to Rent Forklift
Approve Overtime Pay
EmployeeTask.Description: The overtime I submitted was not paid and I'm being told it was not approved. I thought you approved this. What is the problem?

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Vacation Request
EmployeeTask.Description: Planning a trip with the family for 2 weeks. Can you give me the ok so I can submit this to HR?

EmployeeTask.Name: Approve Salary Increase Request
EmployeeTask.Description: I am told by Bart that we have a salary freeze and that my request for an increase in salary is on hold. Please approve this request. I work very hard and deserve to be paid more.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Complaint Reports
EmployeeTask.Description: We are getting a lot of complaints sent to the Consumer Affairs dept. Can you please reivew the report I sent you and send me your thoughts as to how we can deal with all this.

EmployeeTask.Name: Fix Synchronization Issues
EmployeeTask.Description: I don’t know who else to get help from. The automation app is not synchronizing anything so I'm stuck until I get this fixed. I need to finish my testing. Please look at the log report and send Email with info.

EmployeeTask.Name: Increase end-user satisfaction rating from 4.0 to 4.5.
Free Up Space for New Application Set
Install New Router in Dev Room
Schedule Conf Call with SuperMart
EmployeeTask.Description: They had some great things to say about your support follow up. Please schedule a conf call with them. I want to see if we can do a case study for our website.

EmployeeTask.Name: Create New Installer for Company Wide App Deployment
Sumit Travel Expenses for Recent Trip
EmployeeTask.Description: You sent me some receipts by Email but in order for me to get you a payment for expenses, I need your expense report.

EmployeeTask.Name: Make Travel Arrangements for Sales Trip to San Francisco
Implement a better system for tracking incoming requests.
Book Flights to San Fran for Sales Trip
Submit New W4 for Updated Exemptions
Get New Frequent Flier Account
EmployeeTask.Description: Just called the airline for your Jim and they told me they cancelled your frequent flier account. You need to call them yourself and get a new account. As soon as I get it, I will send it to travel dept.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review New Customer Follow Up Plan
EmployeeTask.Description: I've created a detailed follow up with all of our customers. This will help us with retention. Please review and give me OK so I can push it out to the field.

EmployeeTask.Name: Submit Customer Follow Up Plan Feedback
EmployeeTask.Description: Forwarded Ken's new follow up plan to you by email. Need your opinions on it asap so we can get things nailed down in the upcoming months.

EmployeeTask.Name: Review Issue Report and Provide Workarounds
EmployeeTask.Description: We have a stack of issues with the new apps that you need to review and fix asap. I've logged everything in the db. Give me your thoughts.

EmployeeTask.Name: Resubmit Request for Expense Reimbursement
EmployeeTask.Description: I lost your expense reimbursement documents so I'm going to need you to send them to me by Email so this can get paid in this week's check run.

EmployeeTask.Name: Collect more accurate sales leads data.
Approve Vacation Request Form
EmployeeTask.Description: I need to take some time off. My back hurts from lifting all these boxes. Can you please approve my vacation.

EmployeeTask.Name: Email Test Report on New Products
Send Receipts for all Flights Last Month
EmployeeTask.Description: I've not seen last month's flight expense report. Please forward it to me as I cannot reconcile our accounts without them.

EmployeeTask.Name: Increase the quality of our sales approach.
Update NDA Agreement
EmployeeTask.Description: Need sign-off on the new NDA agreement. It's important that this is done quickly to prevent any unauthorized leaks.
